Package FOHClasses

Class Bill

java.lang.Object
FOHClasses.Bill
public class Bill extends Object
A class storing all necessary information of a bill/payment.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bill

      public Bill(int waiterId, long startTimestamp, long endTimestamp, boolean isCash, ArrayList<Integer> items, boolean applyServiceCharge)
      Constructs a bill object.
      Parameters:
      waiterId - The waiter that was responsible for the table
      startTimestamp - The booking's start time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      endTimestamp - The booking's end time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      isCash - Whether the payment/bill has been made in cash
      items - An ArrayList of the IDs purchased by the order
      applyServiceCharge - Whether the service charge should be applied

      Parameters:
      nextId - The number to increase it to

      public static void setServiceChargePercentage(int serviceChargePercentage)
      For management to change the service charge
      Parameters:
      serviceChargePercentage - The percentage of the service charge (0-100)
